name: Rocking Pilot
description: Shoot, blast and slash through hordes of enemies in Rocking Pilot - a twin-stick shooter extravaganza inspired by arcade classics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 9 level (shader model 2.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 692 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 9 level (shader model 2.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 692 MB available space
